Name: Evidence
Description: A research context or question+ Warning: Name should be usable as an identifier for the module by machine processing applications such as code generationElements defined in Ancestors: id, meta, implicitRules, language, text, contained, extension, modifierExtension

Name: url
Description: Canonical identifier for this evidence, represented as a URI (globally unique)

Name: shortTitle
Description: Title for use in informal contexts

Name: publisher
Description: Name of the publisher (organization or individual)

Name: description
Description: Natural language description of the evidence

Name: note
Description: Used for footnotes or explanatory notes

Name: useContext
Description: The context that the content is intended to support

Name: approvalDate
Description: When the evidence was approved by publisher

Name: lastReviewDate
Description: When the evidence was last reviewed

Name: effectivePeriod
Description: When the evidence is expected to be used

Name: topic
Description: The category of the Evidence, such as Education, Treatment, Assessment, etc.DefinitionTopic (Example)
